stats.zh: 已收录 %d 条评价 · 上次更新：%s

disclaimer.zh: 点击"搜索"即表示您理解：结果可能指向真实个人；内容为用户主观意见,准确性与完整性不作保证。
disclaimer.en: By clicking 'Search', you understand: results may refer to real individuals; content represents user opinions and accuracy is not guaranteed.

subtitle.zh:
吃饭这种小事,我们都会提前去大众点评看看评价,约会前为什么不也这样呢?
分享您的Dating点评,获得极致的隐私保护,浏览经过审查的反馈。
subtitle.en:
We check reviews before dining out - why not before dating?
Share your dating experiences with ultimate privacy protection, browse verified feedback.

feature1_desc.zh: 基于个人经历的主观评价；设有严谨的证据审核流程。
feature1_desc.en: Personal experience-based reviews with rigorous evidence verification.

feature2_desc.zh: 敏感信息自动去除,尊重个人边界与合规要求
feature2_desc.en: Automatic removal of sensitive info, respecting privacy and compliance.

feature3_desc.zh: 最快30分钟极速审核,无广告,无推送
feature3_desc.en: Review in as fast as 30 minutes, no ads, no notifications

privacy_notice_1.zh: 首页与浏览页不主动公开姓名；仅展示描述与经隐私化处理的证据缩略图。
privacy_notice_1.en: Names are not publicly displayed on homepage; only descriptions and privacy-processed thumbnails are shown.

privacy_notice_2.zh: 仅在精准姓名匹配搜索结果中出现全名；不提供联想、模糊或部分匹配。
privacy_notice_2.en: Full names only appear in exact search results; no suggestions, fuzzy or partial matches.

privacy_notice_3.zh: 所有提交先由系统进行敏感信息遮盖与安全检查,随后进入人工复核。
privacy_notice_3.en: All submissions undergo automatic sensitive data masking and security checks, followed by manual review.

no_content_desc.zh: 上传评价时可勾选"展示到首页",帮助其他同学更好地了解TA的情况。
no_content_desc.en: You can check 'Display on homepage' when submitting to help others learn about them.

no_results_desc.zh: 请输入完整的姓名进行搜索。例如：搜索"张三"或"Peter Parker",而不是"张"或"Peter"。
no_results_desc.en: Please enter the full name. For example: search for '张三' or 'Peter Parker', not '张' or 'Peter'.

disclaimer.zh: 重要声明：本项目与纽约大学(NYU)或任何教育机构无关联。
disclaimer.en: Important Notice: This project is not affiliated with New York University (NYU) or any educational institution.

support_links.zh: 技术支持 ·加入我们 · 意见反馈

content_disclaimer.zh: 内容由用户提交,仅供参考,不构成事实陈述或建议。详见《服务条款》与《隐私政策》。
content_disclaimer.en: User-submitted content for reference only. Not factual statements or advice. See Terms & Privacy Policy.

page_subtitle.zh: 请基于您的真实经历进行评价。提交后将AI预审后进入人工审核流程；提交通常在约 30 分钟内处理。
page_subtitle.en: Please submit based on your real experiences. Submissions will be AI pre-reviewed then manually reviewed; usually processed within 30 minutes.

email_hint.zh: 仅用于与您联系与通知进度
email_hint.en: Only for contact and progress updates

name_hint.zh: 我们仅在精准姓名匹配搜索时显示全名
name_hint.en: We only show full names in exact name search results

description_placeholder.zh: 请描述您个人的真实经历，避免无端指控和任何隐私信息。推荐包含新闻六要素：时间、地点、人物（使用代称）、起因、经过、结果。
description_placeholder.en: Please describe your personal real experience, avoid baseless accusations and any privacy info. Recommended to include: time, place, people (use aliases), cause, process, result.

privacy_hint.zh: 系统将对证据文件进行充分模糊化处理；原始文件仅供审核使用，对外不可访问。
privacy_hint.en: System will thoroughly blur evidence files; original files are for review only and not publicly accessible.

drag_drop_hint.zh: 点击或拖拽文件到此处

file_types_hint.en: Supports documents, images, videos (e.g., PDF, JPG, PNG, MP4)

evidence_placeholder.zh: 请简要说明此证据的内容和相关性...
evidence_placeholder.en: Please briefly describe the content and relevance of this evidence...

display_homepage_desc.zh: 您的评价将可能出现在首页精选展示中（姓名会被保护）
display_homepage_desc.en: Your review may appear in homepage featured display (name will be protected)

legal_agreement_desc.en: I have read and agree to

verification_hint.zh: 人机验证将在勾选法律条款同意后自动加载
verification_hint.en: Human verification will load automatically after agreeing to legal terms

review_failed.zh: ⚠️ 审核不通过，请修改后重新提交
review_failed.en: ⚠️ Review failed, please modify and resubmit

page_subtitle.zh: 本页展示经审核的用户提交内容。内容为用户主观意见，准确性与完整性不作保证。
page_subtitle.en: This page shows user-submitted content that has been reviewed. Content represents user opinions and accuracy is not guaranteed.

privacy_notice_desc.zh: 为保护隐私，以下仅显示经过模糊处理的证据缩略图，无法下载原始文件。
privacy_notice_desc.en: For privacy protection, only blurred evidence thumbnails are shown below, original files cannot be downloaded.

evidence_not_public.zh: 上传者未开放证据缩略图
evidence_not_public.en: Uploader has not made evidence thumbnails public

appeal_hint.zh: 提示：如认为该记录存在不准确或权益受损，请使用下方申诉功能。我们将尽快处理。
appeal_hint.en: Tip: If you believe this record is inaccurate or your rights are affected, please use the appeal function below. We will process it promptly.

first_comment.zh: 快来发表第一条评论吧！

comment_placeholder.zh: 请输入您的评论...（最多1000字符）

reply_placeholder.zh: 请输入回复内容...（最多1000字符）

page_subtitle.zh: 您的评价已成功提交并进入审核流程
page_subtitle.en: Your review has been successfully submitted and entered the review process

processing_desc.zh: 正在生成缩略图，90%%的评价在30分钟内完成审核
processing_desc.en: Generating thumbnails, 90%% of reviews are completed within 30 minutes

notification_desc.zh: 处理完成后会邮件通知结果
notification_desc.en: Results will be notified by email after processing

page_subtitle_suffix.zh: 。请准确描述您的主张、证据与期望处理方式。
page_subtitle_suffix.en: . Please accurately describe your claim, evidence, and expected resolution.

reason_placeholder.zh: 请详细说明您对该记录的意见、希望纠正的信息，以及期望的处理方式
reason_placeholder.en: Please detail your opinions on this record, information you wish to correct, and expected resolution

evidence_hint.zh: 请将所有支持您申诉的证据材料上传到 Google Drive，设置为"任何人都可查看"，然后提供链接。
evidence_hint.en: Please upload all evidence supporting your appeal to Google Drive, set to 'Anyone can view', then provide the link.

drive_link_hint.zh: 包含所有证据文件的 Google Drive 文件夹或单个文件链接
drive_link_hint.en: Google Drive folder or single file link containing all evidence files

evidence_desc_placeholder.zh: 请简要说明 Google Drive 中包含哪些证据文件，以及它们如何支持您的申诉
evidence_desc_placeholder.en: Please briefly describe what evidence files are in Google Drive and how they support your appeal

req_identity.zh: 必须包含证明您本人身份的材料（如学生证、身份证等）
req_identity.en: Must include materials proving your identity (e.g., student ID, ID card, etc.)

req_permission.zh: Google Drive 链接必须设置为"任何人都可查看"权限
req_permission.en: Google Drive link must be set to 'Anyone can view' permission

req_clarity.zh: 所有证据文件应清晰可读，支持您的申诉理由
req_clarity.en: All evidence files should be clear and readable, supporting your appeal reason

req_privacy.zh: 请勿包含与申诉无关的个人敏感信息
req_privacy.en: Do not include personal sensitive information unrelated to the appeal

review_message.zh: 我们将认真审查您的申诉内容
review_message.en: We will carefully review your appeal

drive_link_provided.zh: 已提供 Google Drive 链接

step1_desc.zh: 管理员将仔细审查您的申诉理由和 Google Drive 中提供的证据材料
step1_desc.en: Admin will carefully review your appeal reason and evidence materials provided in Google Drive

step2_desc.zh: 如需要，我们可能会联系您获取更多信息或澄清相关细节
step2_desc.en: If needed, we may contact you for more information or to clarify relevant details

step3_desc.zh: 处理完成后，我们会第一时间通过邮件通知您审核结果和后续安排
step3_desc.en: After processing, we will promptly notify you of the review results and next steps via email

time_desc.zh: 通常在收到申诉后 72 小时 内完成审核
time_desc.en: Usually completed within 72 hours after receiving the appeal

help_desc.zh: 如果您有任何疑问或需要补充材料，请回复我们发送给您的确认邮件，或者通过以下方式联系我们：
help_desc.en: If you have any questions or need to supplement materials, please reply to our confirmation email, or contact us:
